column5: Beautiful Llano River Front cabin. This is a new custom built cabin. Features custom walk in shower, Pecan counter tops in kitchen and bath, all hand made with old world charm. The front porch is 32' long, covered and looks out over the river. The property is very private with large ranches surrounding it. Great swimming, Kayaking and fishing. This is a true gem on the Llano River. Please feel free to contact for further information and pictures.
